body: It's like watching a car crash...

@arghost: the term you are looking for is "aggregator" because they 'aggregate' in an automated fashion whenever something is out instead of wasting time managing by updating, it probably adds up a lot of resources by doing so, over time. Though, I wonder, this is also taking up a lot of static storage...
@Kapab other web is like that too. Even the fastest and more complete site from Korea and China is like that.
It's only a "reupload" here though, since nhentai lacks the capability to update a gallery and instead treats each update as a new gallery

Here is a link to the healing arc story, also a WIP (work in progress), as of today it's up to ch37: https://www.manga-raw.club/reader/en/the-apothecary-will-make-this-battered-elf-happy-chapter-1-eng-li/

Part of me I'm following this story religiously but at the same time, I feel sad & depressed knowing that a lot of bad shit is gonna happen to her. Yea yea I get it, it's fiction but still, I'm not stone cold blooded. Art is really detailed and this elf is cute too... Ah fuck here we go again, I'm OUT.
I wish I had the sleep spell....................................... So I could sleep.

So we gonna get like 1-2 pages per month or so and we gonna get reupload each and every time, filled with whining in the comments. All just so the artist may advertise his stuff for as long as he can, per chance?
once again, i am feeling immense sadness
Keep on struggling, Struggler. Soon you will meet a apothecary who's a gift from god.
